Check this sticky ( http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide ) for the information you need to provide.

That's normal. The craft has no lift rating since there are no wings attached to the craft, thus there can be no center of lift. It's a result of the simplified aerodynamic model that KSP uses, but it's not a bug in and of itself.

The blue ball will also drop sometimes even if you have wings. That's because the VAB assumes the wind blows down the length of the rocket (from the top down). Since the wings don't generate lift until they have some angle of attach, the lift bubble will sometimes end up at the floor.
